Question: This study was cast into doubt when it was later found that this person himself wrote the study's concluding remarks on Leibniz.
Hints: This tract contained the nucleus that this person developed and expanded to form the Principia.
This person put Chaloner on trial for counterfeiting and had him sent to Newgate Prison in September 1697.
This person died in his sleep in London on 20 March 1727 (OS 20 March 1726; NS 31 March 1727) and was buried in Westminster Abbey.
